item.description:
Dance to the 18-piece Beantown Swing Orchestra. This is the band that will appear in the upcoming movie "Bachelor No. 2" with Kate Hudson, Dane Cook, and Jason Biggs.

Learn basic Lindy Hop moves from champion dance instructors Elizabeth Miller and Davis Thurber.

Note: this time the dance will be held at the Concord Scout House, which is across the street from 51 Walden (where the last three Concord meetups have taken place).

group.name: The Boston-Area Swing/Blues Dance Meetup Group

item.name: Swing Dance in Concord, Mass.
